articles.title: Biden honors Walter Mondale as one of America's 'great giants' at memorial service - CNN
articles.description: President Joe Biden on Sunday honored former Vice President Walter Frederick "Fritz" Mondale as one of America's "great giants" during a deeply personal memorial service address in Minneapolis.

articles.title: What's up in May: So much to see, including an extensive eclipse - Press Herald
articles.description: The major highlight is a very long total lunar eclipse of the full Flower Moon, entirely visible for the eastern half of this U.S. and all of Central and South America.

articles.title: The first solar eclipse of 2022 has begun and here's the view! - Space.com
articles.description: Live broadcasts bring the eclipse from South America worldwide.
articles.content:
It's the moment skywatchers have been waiting for: The year's first solar eclipse has begun.
